member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Net.MonoGamerPeer.SimulatedLatency
member.summary: Used to Simulate the delay between computers

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Net.MonoGamerPeer.SimulatedPacketLoss
member.summary: Used to simulate the number of packets you might expect to loose.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Net.MonoGamerPeer.GetServerList(Lidgren.Network.NetPeer)
member.summary: Contacts the Master Server on the net and gets a list of available host games

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.GuideViewController
member.summary: Used as a parent view controller for iOS 5 (and older) Game Center view controllers. No longer used for iOS 6+ because it's unnecessary and generates runtime warnings. (See comments for ShowGuideViewController below for more information.)

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.Guide.ShowViewController(MonoTouch.UIKit.UIViewController)
member.summary: Shows guide view controllers, e.g., Game Center view controllers. In iOS 5 and older, the guide is presented using GuideViewController. In iOS 6+, the guide is presented using the root view controller. (The iOS 5 method generates runtime warnings.)
member.param: The view controller to be shown, e.g., Game Center view controllers

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.Guide.ShowMatchMaker(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Displays the iOS matchmaker to the player.
member.remarks: Note this is not overloaded in derived classes on purpose. This is only a reason this exists is for caching effects.
